quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Bewitched and Sitcom
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, stephenss. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What year did the show Bewitched first hit the airwaves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1964

questions.question: Who was the second actor to portray Darrin Stephens on the hit sitcom Bewitched?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dick Sargent

questions.question: Who pretended to be Cindys secret admirer on the sitcom The Brady Bunch?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bobby

questions.question: When Greg judged a cheer-leading contest on the sitcom The Brady Bunch, who did he pick?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: None of these.

questions.question: What comedian played Samanthas uncle Arthur on the famous TV show Bewitched?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paul Lynde

questions.question: On the television series The Brady Bunch, who was Bobbys childhood hero?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jesse James

questions.question: The role of Tabitha Stephens on the long-running sitcom Bewitched was played by twin sisters.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who was the first actor to play Darrin Stephens on the popular 60s sitcom Bewitched?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dick York

questions.question: What was the name of Darrin Stephenss boss on Bewitched?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Larry Tate

questions.question: What was the name of the advertising agency at which Darrin Stephens worked on the popular sitcom
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: McMann and Tate

questions.question: Elizabeth Montgomery, who played Samantha Stephens on the sitcom Bewitched, was married in real life to the producer/director of  Bewitched, William Asher.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: This 1981 movie depicts the life of of a famous actress as seen through the eyes of her adopted daughter.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mommy Dearest

questions.question: What year did the long-running sitcom Bewitched leave the airwaves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1972

questions.question: This actress, who starred in the 1941 movie Citizen Kane, played Samanthas mother Endora on the popular sitcom Bewitched.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Agnes Moorehead

questions.question: This 1999 movie, starring Adam Sandler, is about a single guy who adopts the child of his friend in order to impress his ex-girlfriend.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Big Daddy
